recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

recipes.title: California Roll
recipes.description: Sushi roll filled with avocado, crab meat, and cucumber, wrapped in seaweed and rice.

recipes.title: Chicken Tacos
recipes.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with grilled chicken, onions, cilantro, and salsa.

recipes.title: Pad Thai Noodles
recipes.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce.

recipes.title: Cheeseburger
recipes.description: Classic American burger with a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken Curry
recipes.description: Creamy and aromatic Indian curry made with tender chicken cooked in a rich tomato and butter sauce.
